AccSnap.Name: AccSnap
AccSnap.Description: Using a given file dump of your Mario Kart Tour profile, you can see various stats and the full snapshot of your profile!

MKTV.Name: Mario Kart Tour Values
MKTV.Description: A simple tool to help you compare your most valuable items and their high level courses visually!

PeaceAndTranquil.Name: Peace and Tranquilility
PeaceAndTranquil.Description: No one is around to help.
